issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
SIGSEGV SEGV_MAPERR crash when using WebView and alerts during an unlicensed module pop-up. Console Log attached.

This is not a regression. This is reproducible.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Enable Wi-Fi on device.
2. Run attached TiVerify app.

Actual Result:

Unlicensed module pop-up appears, a few seconds later the app crashes.

Expected Result:

Unlicensed module pop-up appears, app does not crash.
fields.summary: Android: WebView: SIGSEGV SEGV_MAPERR when launching unlicensed module
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.1.201207161421
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.GA, 2.1.1.v20120716180600
Android Runtime: V8
OS: Snow Leopard 10.6.8
Devices Tested: Android Emulator 2.3.3
